text:
Hey Vishnu,

It is possible to create custom properties for your contacts and add them to a URL dynamically using <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/personalize-your-content#add-personalization-to-your-content|personalization tokens>, you can create these as a <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/crm-setup/manage-your-properties?_ga=2.113578628.2090959854.1655392269-583420909.1655392269|custom property> for your contact.

It could look like this
```<a href="site.net/login?javatoken={{ contact.uniquejavatoken}}">
 Click here to log in
</a>```
Hope this helps!

Hey guys
Does anyone know where I can find marketplace app API limitations ?
I cant find any documentation of it in the marketplace

Hey
Can you explain? from what I understand that only has to do with calls to HubSpot not from a marketplace app to HubSpot
